comments: This contract is for the services of one of the members of the Independent Review Panel working on the Evaluation of Options work of the Seven-Point Plan for the National Fighter Procurement Secretariat (NFPS). The amendment was  approved by Treasury Board. This contract was awarded on a non-competitive basis. This contract includes one or more amendments. This contract is a multi-year contract. This contract is with a former public servant in receipt of a pension under the Public Service Superannuation Act.
